ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: and had not known about my Reckoning!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: and had not known my account.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: and that we would never knew what our records contained.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: “And had never come to know my account!”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And that I had never known how my account is!"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And I had not known what my account was:
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And knew not what my reckoning!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: and knew nothing of my reckoning.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Nor known whatever was my reckoning!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: nor had I ever known what my account is!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: And that I had never realised how my account (stood)!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And that I had never known, how my Account is?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: Nor that I knew my reckoning!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: And never knew what my account was.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And had not known what is my account.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [69:26] and not known what my account were!
